annotations.description: Runs conformance & node conformance tests on a stable k8s version with cluster-api-provider-azure release-1.7 (v1beta1)
Runs conformance & node conformance tests on latest kubernetes main with cluster-api-provider-azure release-1.7 (v1beta1)

args:
result=0
./scripts/ci-test-coverage.sh || result=$?
cp coverage.* ${ARTIFACTS}
cd ../../k8s.io/test-infra/gopherage
GO111MODULE=on go build .
./gopherage filter --exclude-path="zz_generated,generated\.go" "${ARTIFACTS}/coverage.out" > "${ARTIFACTS}/filtered.cov" || result=$?
./gopherage html "${ARTIFACTS}/filtered.cov" > "${ARTIFACTS}/coverage.html" || result=$?
./gopherage junit --threshold 0 "${ARTIFACTS}/filtered.cov" > "${ARTIFACTS}/junit_coverage.xml" || result=$?
exit $result

annotations.description: This job creates clusters using supported older api versions (v1alpha4), and verifies that the clusters continue to operate properly after the api version is upgraded to the latest (v1beta1).
Creates a CAPZ cluster and exports KUBECONFIG. This job validates ci-entrypoint.sh used by other repositories for running tests on CAPZ clusters.
This job creates clusters using supported older api versions (v1alpha4), and verifies that the clusters continue to operate properly after the api version is upgraded to the latest (v1beta1).
Creates a CAPZ cluster and exports KUBECONFIG. This job validates ci-entrypoint.sh used by other repositories for running tests on CAPZ clusters.
Runs conformance & node conformance tests on a stable k8s version with latest cluster-api-provider-azure
Runs conformance & node conformance tests on latest kubernetes master with cluster-api-provider-azure
This job creates clusters using supported older api versions (v1alpha4), and verifies that the clusters continue to operate properly after the api version is upgraded to the latest (v1beta1).

args:
result=0
./scripts/ci-test-coverage.sh || result=$?
cp coverage.* ${ARTIFACTS}
cd ../../k8s.io/test-infra/gopherage
GO111MODULE=on go build .
./gopherage filter --exclude-path="zz_generated,generated\.go" "${ARTIFACTS}/coverage.out" > "${ARTIFACTS}/filtered.cov" || result=$?
./gopherage html "${ARTIFACTS}/filtered.cov" > "${ARTIFACTS}/coverage.html" || result=$?
./gopherage junit --threshold 0 "${ARTIFACTS}/filtered.cov" > "${ARTIFACTS}/junit_coverage.xml" || result=$?
exit $result
